name: Tap de PuruMoe!! Neiro Mikura
summary:
Once you get in,you'll meet some lovely maid to serve for you.
There was kinky cafe in basement of a building. Once you get in,you'll meet some lovely maid to serve for you.
But today,the maid seems in a bad mood... Please use your techniques to delight her and get your service.

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
